SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess rate relapse allogeneic HSCT use nonmyeloablative conditioning patient fludarabine-refractory , FCR-failed , del 17p CLL compare historical data autologous HSCT . II . To estimate incidence grade 2-4 acute graft-versus-host disease ( GVHD ) chronic GVHD patient CLL treat low-dose TBI , fludarabine , peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) infusion immunosuppression cyclosporine mycophenolate mofetil . III . To characterize rate type infection regimen . IV . To estimate rate transplant-related mortality first 200 day . OUTLINE : NONMYELOABLATIVE CONDITIONING : Patients receive fludarabine phosphate intravenously ( IV ) day -4 -2 TBI day 0 . TRANSPLANT : Patients undergo allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell transplant day 0 . GVHD PROPHYLAXIS : Patients receive cyclosporine orally ( PO ) every 12 hour day -3 180 taper begin day 56 mycophenolate mofetil PO every 12 hour day 0-27 .
